data.text: @bmj_latest Do you need molnupiravir/ actemra/ favipiravir or any Anticancer medicines ? We are pharmaceutical companies from Bangladesh exporting all types of medicines.

@bmj_latest “#Molnupiravir: ineffective, carcinogenic, and a global threat”

https://t.co/Pivcc14znH https://t.co/hJzlercaTI

@bmj_latest Can I suggest to change the icons for "recommendations against" from a blue X to a red one like this: ⛔ ?
Also colour of drugs should be better if red or "switched off" colour (or gray as well). For example Lopinavir-ritonavir in green🟢 can let people thinking "it's ok". Thanks
